response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. I understand its worth to you might be $1,000,000, but this offer presents a unique chance to secure it at a favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
